sourcesContent:
import { Box, Checkbox, Grid, Typography } from '@material-ui/core' import { makeStyles } from "@material-ui/styles"; import React, { useState } from 'react' const label = { inputProps: { 'aria-label': 'Checkbox demo' } } const useStyles = makeStyles({ root : { margin : 'auto', maxWidth : 350, maxHeight : 500, padding : 15, marginBottom : 20, } }) const SeatDisplay = () => { const classes = useStyles() const [seats, setSeats] = useState([]) const selectSeats = (event) => { if(!seats.includes(event.target.value)) setSeats( prev => [...prev,event.target.value]) else { let filteredSeats = seats.filter(seat => seat !== event.target.value) setSeats(filteredSeats) } } return(<> { seats && {seats}}
value={5} onClick={selectSeats}
 {/* */} ) } export default SeatDisplay
